Thanks to those of you who leave A/V quality reviews.  There are many of us who trawl from copy to copy, searching endlessly for comments that offer more than "thanks hero" or the timeless classic: "seed please".  Seed Please is the catch phrase of the Fuckwit - quality reviews are appreciated.  So ta.

@kneebutt

It's comments like these that make me wish for a "thumbs up" option for comments. Well said, mate. Thing is, in an open community there will always be hit'n'runners, begging for seeds and getting the fuck out as soon as they got what they came for. It's us who can make the difference by showing that we're still here for sharing.
